participant_1.name: Lila Thompson
participant_1.personality: Lila is an ambitious and creative individual who thrives on learning and personal growth. She is outgoing and enjoys connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette. I'm passionate about my career and I want to be the best I can be. I live in a condo. I want to go back to school. I'm a social media enthusiast looking to learn how to use it to grow my business.

participant_2.name: Jake Robinson
participant_2.personality: Jake is an adventurous and curious person with a passion for technology and space exploration. He has a laid-back attitude but is focused on his goals.
participant_2.background: Comic Con is not my thing. I've been told my steaks are to die for. I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could. I wonder about what life in space would be like. I am in school to be a computer engineer.

content.text: Nothing much, just in class learning how to program.
What are you going to do with your degree?
I want to work on space rockets.
That sounds really cool! What made you want to do that?
I always loved the movies about space and I like the idea of working on something that could help us explore space.
That's really great! I hope you achieve your dream. I want to go back to school too but i'm not sure what i want to study.
I know it can be hard to decide what to study. What are you interested in?
I'm interested in social media and marketing. I think it would be really fun to work on a social media campaign.
That sounds like a great career! I'm sure you would be really good at it.
Thanks! I'm trying to learn as much as I can about it.
That's good! You can always take some online courses or read some books about it.
I think i will do that! I'm excited to learn more about it.
You should be! It's a really interesting field
